guild.description:
Here we go again...

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/post/66iv/ee_ubwXLfNg)

*Cabal*: n. the contrived schemes of a group of persons secretly united in a plot - also: a group engaged in such schemes.

*Powermod*: n. [short for power moderator] a person of power, usually a moderator on a structured website, that takes too many unpopulist stances

This guild is dedicated to whistleblowing and preventing powermods and the forming of a powermod oligarchy which would censor opinions and lead Ruqqus into the same corruption that is killing Reddit.

body:
>Guilds in danger:

> +foxes

This will never happen to +Foxes1488

In all seriousness, Ruqqus is fucked. Move to poal.co if you haven't already. By the look of the downvote count and comments, the RCP has already brigaded this post. It's clear the admins are the puppets of Carp and his gang. It's only a matter of time before we're all banned by them for dissenting opinions under a bullshit reason.
body_html:
Guilds in danger:

+foxes

This will never happen to +foxes1488

In all seriousness, Ruqqus is fucked. Move to poal.co if you haven't already. By the look of the downvote count and comments, the RCP has already brigaded this post. It's clear the admins are the puppets of Carp and his gang. It's only a matter of time before we're all banned by them for dissenting opinions under a bullshit reason.

*Powermod*: n. [short for power moderator] a person of power, usually a moderator on a structured website, that takes too many unpopulist stances

This guild is dedicated to whistleblowing and preventing powermods and the forming of a powermod oligarchy which would censor opinions and lead Ruqqus into the same corruption that is killing Reddit.

parent.body:
>Guilds in danger:

> +foxes

This will never happen to +Foxes1488

In all seriousness, Ruqqus is fucked. Move to poal.co if you haven't already. By the look of the downvote count and comments, the RCP has already brigaded this post. It's clear the admins are the puppets of Carp and his gang. It's only a matter of time before we're all banned by them for dissenting opinions under a bullshit reason.

post.title: The banout 2021 is in full swing

body:
Happy New Year @CrystalVulpine

I said I hope they never silence you... and part of that may be not letting them provoke you into any action they may use as justification to ban you... like Klenvastergan did after his guilds were shadowbanned.

You were correct in your post to this guild 5 months ago... https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/1alf/why-ruqqus-is-already-in-danger

Anyone with their eyes open can see the truth of it.

Pick your battles. Live to fight another day...
body_html:
Happy New Year @CrystalVulpine

I said I hope they never silence you... and part of that may be not letting them provoke you into any action they may use as justification to ban you... like Klenvastergan did after his guilds were shadowbanned.

You were correct in your post to this guild 5 months ago... https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/1alf/why-ruqqus-is-already-in-danger

Anyone with their eyes open can see the truth of it.

Pick your battles. Live to fight another day...
